Alchemist.1: Alchemists ignore collision and never stop moving.

Avatar.1: Avatar's Origin Element is counted twice for Trait bonuses.

Berserker.3: Berserkers have a 45% chance to hit units in cone in front of them and apply on-hit effects.
Berserker.6: Berserkers hit units in cone in front of them, apply on-hit effects, and have +25 attack damage.

Blademaster.2: 40% chance to trigger 1 additional attack against their target.
Blademaster.4: 40% chance to trigger 2 additional attacks against their target.
Blademaster.6: 40% chance to trigger 3 additional attacks against their target.

Mage.3: Mages have a 50% chance cast an additional time.
Mage.6: Mages have a 100% chance cast an additional time.

Predator.3: Predators instantly kill enemies they damage who are below 25% health.

Ranger.2: Rangers have a 35% chance to gain x2 attack speed for 3 seconds every 3 seconds.
Ranger.4: Rangers have a 80% chance to gain x2 attack speed for 3 seconds every 3 seconds.

Soulbound.2: The first Soulbound champion to die will instead continue to fight until all other Soulbound champions are dead.

Summoner.3: Summoned units gain +30% bonus health and last longer.
Summoner.6: Summoned units gain +120% bonus health and last longer.

Cloud.2: All allies have a 20% chance to dodge enemy basic attacks.
Cloud.3: All allies have a 25% chance to dodge enemy basic attacks.
Cloud.4: All allies have a 35% chance to dodge enemy basic attacks.

Crystal.2: Crystal units take a maximum of 100 damange from a single attack or ability hit.
Crystal.4: Crystal units take a maximum of 60 damange from a single attack or ability hit.

Electric.2: Electric units shock nearby enemies for 100 damage whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.
Electric.3: Electric units shock nearby enemies for 300 damage whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.
Electric.4: Electric units shock nearby enemies for 500 damage whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.

Glacial.2: Glacial units basic attacks have a 20% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds on-hit.
Glacial.4: Glacial units basic attacks have a 40% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds on-hit.
Glacial.6: Glacial units basic attacks have a 60% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds on-hit.

Inferno.3: Inferno spells and crits burn 1 hex beneath damage targets, dealing 70% of the spell's damage over 4 seconds.
Inferno.6: Inferno spells and crits burn 3 hexes beneath damage targets, dealing 120% of the spell's damage over 4 seconds.
Inferno.9: Inferno spells and crits burn 5 hexes beneath damage targets, dealing 180% of the spell's damage over 4 seconds.

Light.3: When a Light unit dies, all other Light units gain +15% attack speed and heal 25% of the dead unit's maximum health.
Light.6: When a Light unit dies, all other Light units gain +25% attack speed and heal 25% of the dead unit's maximum health.
Light.9: When a Light unit dies, all other Light units gain +35% attack speed and heal 25% of the dead unit's maximum health.

Lunar.2: Every 7 seconds, your team gains 15% Critical Strike Chance and Damage, and 10% Spell Power. (Stacks up to 4 times).

Mountain.2: At the start of combat, a random ally gains a 1500 health stoneshield.

Ocean.2: All allies restore +15 mana every 4 seconds.
Ocean.4: All allies restore +30 mana every 4 seconds.
Ocean.6: All allies restore +60 mana every 4 seconds.

Poison.3: Poison units apply Neurotoxin when they deal damage, increasing the mana cost of the target's spell by 50%.

Shadow.3: Shadow units deal +70% increased damage for 4 seconds at combat start, refreshed on self takedown.
Shadow.6: Shadow units deal +140% increased damage for 4 seconds at combat start, refreshed on any Shadow unit takedown.

Steel.2: Steel units gain damage immunity for a 2 seconds when they are reduced below 50% health.
Steel.3: Steel units gain damage immunity for a 3 seconds when they are reduced below 50% health.
Steel.4: Steel units gain damage immunity for a 4 seconds when they are reduced below 50% health.

Woodland.3: At the start of combat, a random Woodland champion makes a copy of themselves (excluding items).

Variable.1: At the start of the game, gain the element of the board.
